"In the Driving Rain 2018":
"Strange sounds have been detected in
the Forest area of Planet Naberius,
along with rapid weather fluctuations.
We have also confirmed that the
enemies are unusually strong, which
may impact other missions.
Investigate as soon as possible, and
eliminate as many enemies as you can.
―――――――――――――――――――
Quest Points are shared amongst the room.
Quest ends when time limit expires."
"Defeat the enemies within the time limit!"
"You'll be transferred momentarily. Your objective is to figure out the source of the unexplained weather phenomena in the Forest area."
"We have confirmed reports of strong enemies lurking in the rain around the area."
"Currently, we are experiencing sunny weather, however that is expected to change throughout the investigation. So good luck out there."
